entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.14.1
entry.content:
Resolved an issue where metadata from the previous image could incorrectly appear on the current image.

What's Changed

âš¡ Fixes

  • z-index css var fix by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/210

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.14.0...v0.14.1

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.14.2
entry.content:
Webhook Security

We've added a new security header called X-Kiosk-Signature-256. This works similar to GitHub's webhook security system. For more details, check out our documentation.

Image Orientation Fix

Thanks to @tal-sitton, images now correctly display based on their EXIF orientation data. This fix was needed only when use_original_images was enabled, since Immich normally handles orientation correction automatically.

What's Changed

ðŸš€ New Features

  • add webhook signature header by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/215

Other changes

  • fix: use exif to fix image orientation by @tal-sitton in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/212

New Contributors

  • @tal-sitton made their first contribution in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/212

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.14.1...v0.14.2

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.14.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

ðŸš€ New Features

  • None image content is now compressed and served via gzip

âš¡ Fixes

  • fix base config persisting when person/album url param set by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/226
  • fix mime type when using the raw image endpoint by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/228

Other changes

  • Documentation: Adding an example of using Google Cast provided by chris.burrow by @chris-burrow-apps in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/229

New Contributors

  • @chris-burrow-apps made their first contribution in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/229

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.14.4...v0.14.5
